at the beginning of the end step sacrifice cardname
at the beginning of each end step discard your hand
at the beginning of each end step or when cardname leaves the battlefield destroy all tokens created with cardname they can't be regenerated
destroy all creatures they can't be regenerated
destroy all artifacts they can't be regenerated

when cardname leaves the battlefield exile all tokens created with cardname
when cardname leaves the battlefield destroy all tokens created with cardname they can't be regenerated
